title: Columbus Day Controversy: Why Many Refuse To Celebrate Questionable Holiday
text:
Published By: Hollywood Life - Today 
Columbus Day is here again, however, many refuse to celebrate, as the land which Christopher Columbus ‘discovered’ was actually inhabit...
